org.javalite.activeweb.RequestBuilder

  • Packages that use RequestBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.javalite.activeweb
    ActiveWeb - the agile java framework

    • Uses of RequestBuilder in org.javalite.activeweb

      Methods in org.javalite.activeweb that return RequestBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.content​(byte[] content)  
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.contentType​(String contentType)
      Sets content type on request.
      protected RequestBuilder AppIntegrationSpec.controller​(String controllerPath)
      Takes controller path.
      protected RequestBuilder IntegrationSpec.controller​(String controllerName)  
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.cookie​(Cookie cookie)
      Adds cookie to current request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.format​(String format)
      Sets format for this request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.formItem​(Object fieldName, Object value)
      Convenience method to add a non-file form item to request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.formItem​(String fileName, String fieldName, boolean isFile, String contentType, byte[] content)
      Adds an "uploaded" file to the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.formItem​(FormItem item)
      Adds "uploaded" file to the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.formItems​(Object... namesAndValues)
      Convenience method for sending pairs of name and values with multi-part request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.header​(String name, String value)
      Sets a single header for the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.headers​(String... namesAndValues)
      Convenience method to set names and values for headers.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.id​(Object id)
      Sets ID for this request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.param​(String name)
      Convenience method, exists to pass parameters with blank values.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.param​(String name, Object value)
      Sets a single parameter for request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.params​(Object... namesAndValues)
      Convenience method for setting parameters of the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.queryString​(String queryString)
      Sets a query string (as in URL) for the request.
      RequestBuilder RequestBuilder.remoteAddress​(String remoteAddress)
      Use to simulate a remote IP address.
      protected RequestBuilder ControllerSpec.request()
      Use this DSL-ish method to send requests to controllers from specs.
